arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy with a Non-{c_important}Basic{/c} Skill has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to drop a Healing Potion.
